title: Capacitor - charge distribution on a dielectric

content.question: A charged capacitor has a neutral dielectric inserted between its plates. Which of the following best describes the charge distribution of the dielectric?

choices.label: Remains neutral and is not polarized
Becomes charged but only on the surface
Becomes charged with an equal charge distribution throughout the entire dielectric

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
